name: uzxrd
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cxr))
-| wss(cr, cxr)
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cxr))
-| wss(cr, cxr)
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))

|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cxr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cuz, c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cxr))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cuz, c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))

comment: An upper integer is an extended real. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 2-Jan-2022.)
